tern
  • Reference

Reference version 0.5.0

tern-package

TLG creation functions

Tables

t_coxph

Proportional Hazards Regression Model Fit Summary Table

t_forest_rsp

Response Table as used for Forest Plot

t_forest_tte

Time-to-event Table as used for Forest Plot

t_km

Kaplan Meier Fit Summary Table

t_rsp

Response Table

t_summarize_by_visit

Summary Table by Visit

t_summarize_variables

Variables Summary Table

t_tte

Time to Event Table

Graphs

g_forest

Create a Forest Plot based on a Table

g_km

Kaplan-Meier Plot

Graphs Helper Functions

these functions are useful to modify graphs

addTable

Add an rtable as Text Annotation to a Gird Grob

Data Helper Functions

these functions are used by other functions to derive data

var_labels

Get Label Attributes of Variables in a data.frame

var_labels<-

Set Label Attributes of All Variables in a data.frame

var_relabel

Copy and Change Variable Labels of a data.frame

drop_shared_variables

Remove Shared Variables

reorder_to_match_id

Return Ordered Dataset so that a set of variables match exactly
